Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet
Description: Small broken amulet, made from a blue enamelled paste, black on the lower part, and perforated at the top of the existing part. Possibly the base of a divinity, originally intended to comprise an engraving, there appear traces of movement on the little that has reached us.
